nodes.text: The Seario Memorial Showroom was a venue located in the Czerka Arms facility on the moon, CZ-198 during the era of the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire. Named after the President of Czerka Arms during the era of the Jedi Civil War, Pollard Seario, the showroom presented the technology and innovative consumer products researched and produced in the facility.
